definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
Tangun, legendary founder of Korea in 2333 BC

sentences.english: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華不容什麼人欺負他們，爲他們的緣故責備君王。

sentences.english: All the kings of the nations, even all of them, lie in glory, every one in his own house.
sentences.chinese: 列國的君王俱各在自己陰宅的榮耀中安睡。

sentences.english: Now it came to pass that Naas the king of the children of Ammon died, and his son reigned is his stead.
sentences.chinese: 此後阿孟子民的君王納哈士死了，他的兒子繼位爲王。

sentences.english: I deem that a king conforming to Tao should be selfless.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲合於道的君王應該是大公無私的。

sentences.english: I will speak of your statutes before kings and will not be put to shame
sentences.chinese: 我也要在君王面前，論說你的法度，並不至於羞愧。

sentences.english: The office of priest -king was reserved by God for the Messiah, the Lord Jesus alone.
sentences.chinese: 祭司兼君王的位置，上帝唯獨保留給彌賽亞主耶穌。

sentences.english: They always hold that we are flatterers around the king.
sentences.chinese: 他們總是認爲，我們是君王前狡詐諂媚之輩。

sentences.english: If a king judges the poor with equity, his throne will be established forever.
sentences.chinese: 君王憑誠實判斷窮人，他的國位必永遠堅立。

sentences.english: The blood of monarchs with his prophecies.
sentences.chinese: 其預言令君王之血再度凍凝。

sentences.english: Seeing slow dance and hearing fluted or stringed song.
sentences.chinese: 緩歌慢舞凝絲竹，盡日君王看不足。

sentences.english: In the very early days, China was divided and ruled by many kings.
sentences.chinese: 在最初時期，中國曾被許多君王割據。

sentences.english: Aser, his bread shall be fat, and he shall yield dainties to kings.
sentences.chinese: 阿協爾的食物肥美，將供給君王的佳餚。

sentences.english: The great kings look down on us from those stars.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的君王們正從星星上俯視我們。

sentences.english: There you drink while listening to my singing.
If a ruler hearken to lies, all his servants are wicked.
sentences.chinese: 君王若聽謊言，他一切臣僕都是奸惡。

sentences.english: And all the earth sought to Solomon, to hear his wisdom, which God had put in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門王的財富和智慧，超過了世界上所有的君王。

definition: the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
